Interests:

Lean Startup Food and Health-Tech Travel Equestrian sports and mountain biking

Background:

Ida grew up and recently graduated from University in Germany. During her business studies she learned Japanese as an exchange student in Osaka. Last summer she gained first Startup experience as an intern with an online retailer for eye glasses in Berlin. An introduction to Design Thinking released Ida's passion for solving (customer) problems and developing new products. She started to build her passion for Japanese food with Bentida. With family ties in Boston, she often visited and looked for ways to come back. A summer job in 2011 served as a first step. Seeking an innovative and fast-paced environment, she decided to move to Boston this spring. Ida wants to work for a Startup and develop expertise in sales, business development and operations.
